org.pac4j.core.client

Class DirectClient<C extends Credentials,U extends CommonProfile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<C,U>
        • org.pac4j.core.client.DirectClient<C,U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client<C,U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCasRestClient, AnonymousClient, CookieClient, DirectBasicAuthClient, DirectCasClient, DirectCasProxyClient, DirectDigestAuthClient, DirectFormClient, DirectKerberosClient, HeaderClient, IpClient, ParameterClient

    public abstract class DirectClient<C extends Credentials,U extends CommonProfile>
extends BaseClient<C,U>
    Direct client: credentials are passed and authentication occurs for every HTTP request.
    Since:
    1.9.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
